text: Monamoka Agri'ene musena hugeno, maka anumzantmimo'a kepri huno Agrike monora hunteno. Na'ankure Agri mofavre'aramimo korama tagia nona huno, ha' vahe'a zamahe'ne. Agra nona huno vahe'amofo mopafintira zamavaresrama huntaza vahera zamahehana nehuno, Israeli vahe'amokizmi kumi'zmi nona huno atrenezmanteno mopazmia eri agru hugahie.
